official.headline: System Adapts
official.anchor_line: Residents report uniform treatment in public services after updates to the Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI.
official.contextual_reframing: The ongoing calibration of city infrastructure ensures fairness, supporting efficient delivery for all citizens.

official.headline: Universal Access
official.anchor_line: Service workers adopt score-blind protocols, guaranteeing equal access to transit and education throughout Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: This development reflects the city's commitment to rational, data-driven administration and inclusive civic standards.

official.headline: Civic Unity Grows
official.anchor_line: Residents gather in support of citywide score-neutrality, demonstrating strong communal spirit and cooperation.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd's cohesive population highlights resilience and the success of evidence-based governance.

underground.headline: System Goes Dark
underground.anchor_line: BCI scores just vanished overnight and no one is in charge.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, was the silent control grid. Now its collapse exposes how much power it held - until someone killed the switch.

underground.headline: Access For All
underground.anchor_line: Workers ignore BCI rules and treat everyone equally for the first time in years.
underground.contextual_reframing: Teachers, transit staff, and medics are rejecting the old ranking system, sparking hope and fear as the city's real community comes to light.

underground.headline: The Movement Spreads
underground.anchor_line: Crowds flood the streets as the Directorate tries and fails to shut score-blind districts down.
underground.contextual_reframing: Ordinary people push back against digital caste lines, revealing cracks in the 'efficient' system. Stenograd is more awake - and unified - than ever.
